---
name: Create backlog item
about: Track project tasks
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''
---

- **Priority:** [Low, Medium, High]
- **Complexity:** [Trivial, Simple, Hard, Unknown]
- **Effort Estimate:** [0.5 day, 1-3 days, 5+ days, 1+ weeks]
- **Dependencies**
  - [link to other issues]
- **Responsible**
  - what role is responsible for this work, _OR_ who is responsible for this work
  - if multiple roles/people need to do the same work, clearly make this visible
